title.rendered: French Bistro Bar Stool – Standard Gun Metal with Clear Lacquer

content.rendered:
The French Bistro Bar Stool is a fully welded chair made from mild steel, with evidence of the welding, polishing process still visible.

There may be some industrial markings on each chair enhancing the attraction of the chair, making each chair unique.

The  French Bistro Bar Stool is stackable and is only suitable for indoor use.

This is a high quality, commercial grade stool.

Held in stock in a gun metal; as shown for delivery in 3-4 days. Upholstery incurs an extra lead time of: 10 Working Days.

1 Year structural guarantee on the French Bistro Items & a 1 year guarantee on the finish/lacquer.
